context_bundle.summary: Linux dual-boot setup on STRYK system. D: drive target, GRUB bootloader, partition layout, prerequisites.

onboarding.quick_start: Target: D: drive (4TB, 2.36TB free). Allocation: 100GB root, 8GB swap, rest /home. Bootloader: GRUB (UEFI+GPT ready). BEFORE INSTALL: Disable Fast Startup + hibernation. VHDX won't work for Linux boot.
known_errors: VHDX native boot = Windows only, Linux CANNOT boot from VHDX
Windows updates may reset boot order
Fast Startup + hibernation corrupt shared partitions
